QuestData.Title: The Longest Vigil
QuestData.Description: It was a good thing we sought two sources of energy. Even with the conduits active, the construct has not stirred.$b$bIt has likely been inactive a long while. Perhaps as long as Eredath has floated above Argus.$b$bWhat a long, lonely vigil it must have been.$b$b<Y'mera is silent for a moment as she peers at the construct.>$b$bGo ahead and jostle it a little. That combined with one last burst of magic ought to do the trick.
